### Regression Models:

**Linear Regression Models:**
1. Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) Regression
2. Ridge Regression
3. Lasso Regression
4. Elastic Net Regression
5. Polynomial Regression

**Bayesian Regression Models:**
6. Bayesian Linear Regression
7. Bayesian Ridge Regression
8. Bayesian Lasso
9. Gaussian Process Regression

**Tree-Based Regression Models:**
10. Decision Trees

**Ensemble Regression Models:**
11. Random Forest
12. Gradient Boosting Machines (GBM)
13. XGBoost
14. LightGBM
15. CatBoost

**Support Vector Regression:**
16. Support Vector Regression (SVR)

**Non-Parametric Regression Models:**
17. K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
18. Kernel Regression
19. Local Polynomial Regression
20. Nadaraya-Watson Kernel Regression

**Subset Selection Models:**
21. Stepwise Regression (Including Forward Selection and Backward Elimination)

**Partial Least Squares (PLS) Models:**
22. Ridge Partial Least Squares (Ridge PLS)
23. Lasso Partial Least Squares (Lasso PLS)

**Generalized Regression Models:**
24. Generalized Additive Models (GAM)
25. Tobit Regression
26. Quantile Regression
27. Isotonic Regression

**Segmented Regression Models:**
28. Piecewise Regression
29. Segmented Regression

**Sparse Regression Models:**
30. Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator (LARS)
31. Lasso Least Angle Regression (LARS-Lasso)

**Ordinal Regression Models:**
32. Proportional Odds Model
33. Continuation Ratio Model
34. Adjacent Category Model

**Advanced Regression Models:**
35. Zero-Inflated Regression
36. Hurdle Models
37. Two-Part Models
38. Truncated Regression
39. Mixture Regression Models
40. Fractional Regression Models
41. Spatial Regression Models
